test_cases.title: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
test_cases.description: Verify that the system allows a user to log in successfully with valid login credentials.
preconditions: User account exists with valid email and password

test_steps.action: Enter valid email and password in the login form
test_steps.expected_result: The login form should submit successfully and redirect to the dashboard

test_steps.action: Verify that the user is logged in and can access the dashboard
test_steps.expected_result: The user should be logged in and able to access the dashboard

expected_results: The user is logged in successfully

test_cases.title: Failed Login with Invalid Credentials
test_cases.description: Verify that the system prevents a user from logging in with invalid login credentials.
preconditions: User account exists with valid email and password

test_steps.action: Enter invalid email and password in the login form
test_steps.expected_result: The login form should display an error message indicating invalid credentials

test_steps.action: Verify that the user is not logged in and cannot access the dashboard
test_steps.expected_result: The user should not be logged in and unable to access the dashboard

expected_results: The user is not logged in and an error message is displayed

test_cases.title: Forgot Password Workflow
test_cases.description: Verify that the system allows a user to reset their password through the forgot password workflow.
preconditions: User account exists with valid email

test_steps.action: Click the forgot password link on the login page
test_steps.expected_result: The user should be redirected to the forgot password page

test_steps.action: Enter the user's email address and submit the form
test_steps.expected_result: The system should send a password reset link to the user's email address

test_steps.action: Click the password reset link in the email and enter a new password
test_steps.expected_result: The user should be logged in with the new password

expected_results: The user's password is reset successfully
